content: elephant and piggie amigurumi pattern 1 elephant and piggie amigurumi pattern by kristel koevenig this is a free pattern do not distribute or sell pattern through e-mail print or any other form finished product will be measure around 9 5 inches tall and 8 inches long depending on yarn gauge and type abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet decrease decrease single_crochet 2 decrease increase increase single_crochet 2 in next st slip_stitch slip_stitch blo back-loop only elephant and piggie amigurumi pattern 2 materials for elephant  worsted-weight yarn in light gray brand used red heart super saver  size g hook 4 mm crochet hook  fiberfill or stuffing  needle with a large eye  white felt black embroidery thread or black yarn  black felt or fabric paint for eye  fabric glue or white needle-and-thread instructions that need to be for piggie repeated will be marked  worsted-weight yarn in pink brand used red heart super with marked with brackets saver like this followed by the  size g hook 4 mm crochet hook number of times repeated  fiberfill or stuffing everything is crocheted in  needle with a large eye the round unless stated  black felt
